attributes.action: Media to stop showing images of Jimmy Savile when publishing reports
attributes.background: Everyone is aware of Jimmy Savile's face. To spare his many victims and the general public the countless photographs being published, we ask if all reports and further news block further images of his face being shown

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an editorial decision for media organisations.
